attributes.action: Limit fireworks to one night a year to prevent animal distress and animal death
attributes.additional_details: We want parliament to limit the amount of damage caused to wildlife and the environment due to fireworks. There should be a limit to the amount of nights fireworks can be released due to the damage to animals and the environment or even a limit to licensed premises only having fireworks or silent fireworks. Too much stress is caused and animal deaths due to the amount of unnatural noise pr change in environments.
attributes.background: Limit fireworks to the nearest Saturday to bonfire night or people can only use silent fireworks. The stress is too much for animals and households. Natural wildlife is also suffering from multiple nights of noise and shock. It’s detrimental to animals that fireworks are limited or reduced

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700537
